page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content:
The major urban development in this block is the northern part of{ {Abertillery,Blaenau Gwent and {Cwmtillery.}The housing of this area may be classified into three groups:_
1).Old stone houses and cottages.These are the majority of the dwellings in the block and many are in a bad state of repair or lacking modern facilities. 2).These are Council houses and flats. This stock is in three main areas _Blaenau Gwent Avenues;Valley View, Cwmtillery;and Arael View. 3).Private houses and bungalows.These are scattered through the area. Overall the housing stock is older than eighty years and needs replacing. The most modern developments are three senior citizens complexes in Cwmtillery and Blaenau Gwent.
